summary: I WAS PULLING INTO A PARKING SPOT IN FRONT OF THE GROCERY STORE, WHEN THE CAR STARTED TO REV UP THE ENGINE AND DRIVE AT SPEED HITTING A SUPPORTING COLUMN IN FRONT OF THE STORE.  THE CAR JUMPED THE CEMENT BLOCK AND FRONT WAS ON SIDEWALK. PASSENGER SIDE FRONT FENDER, WHEEL, SMASHED. ACCELERATOR STUCK.
